description: Make the most of summer produce with this healthier salad recipe. With salmon and an Asian-inspired dressing, this vibrant salad is perfect for summer feasting.
name: Easy Summer Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide carrot, cabbage, baby cucumber and radish among plates. Top with edamame, onion and salmon, then drizzle with dressing. Serve scattered with chia seeds and shallots.
